code: import React,{createContext,useContext,useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const StateContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();function getFreshContext(){if(localStorage.getItem('context')===null)localStorage.setItem('context',JSON.stringify({participantId:0,timeTaken:0,selectedOptions:[]}));return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('context'));}export function ContextProvider(_ref){let{children}=_ref;const[context,setContext]=useState(getFreshContext());useEffect(()=>{localStorage.setItem('context',JSON.stringify(context));},[context]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StateContext.Provider,{value:{context,setContext},children:children});}export default function useStateContext(){const{context,setContext}=useContext(StateContext);return{context,setContext:obj=>{setContext({...context,...obj});},resetContext:()=>{localStorage.removeItem('context');setContext(getFreshContext());}};}
